content: Live during major moves gets views

faq.question: Best screen recording for charts?
faq.answer: OBS Studio—free, powerful, handles high resolution. Screen capture of TradingView or exchange charts. 4K if possible so text is readable. Bitrate high enough for chart details.

faq.question: Should I stream live?
faq.answer: Very effective for crypto—viewers want real-time analysis during volatility. Build community through live chat. Archive to YouTube for those who miss live. Major events drive big live audiences.

faq.question: How to avoid legal issues?
faq.answer: Always include not financial advice disclaimers. Don't promise returns. Disclose if you hold assets discussed. Be transparent about sponsorships. Follow platform guidelines carefully.

faq.question: Facecam or no facecam?
faq.answer: Both work—facecam builds personal connection and trust. Screen-only can work for pure analysis. Many top channels use picture-in-picture: charts with small facecam. Test what fits your style.
